movie_results.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movie_results.original_title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movie_results.overview: Jack Sparrow, a freewheeling 18th-century pirate, quarrels with a rival pirate bent on pillaging Port Royal. When the governor's daughter is kidnapped, Sparrow decides to help the girl's love save her.
